 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Perspectiva Nacional is a forum of interviews and debates that touch the fibres of our Latin American community in this country, addressing topics ranging from immigration, economy, health, to issues that impact the family core. Perspectiva Nacional is hosted by Tsi-tsi-ki Felix, an Emmy-winning journalist with a career of more than 15 years in the industry. It is transmitted through radio and television in the 50 main Hispanic markets of the nation.
imdb.title: Perspectiva Nacional
plot: _Perspectiva Nacional_ (qv) is a forum of interviews and debates that touch the fibres of our Latin American community in this country, addressing topics ranging from immigration, economy, health, to issues that impact the family core. _Perspectiva Nacional_ (qv) is hosted by Tsi-tsi-ki Felix, an Emmy-winning journalist with a career of more than 15 years in the industry. It is transmitted through radio and television in the 50 main Hispanic markets of the nation.
